rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with traditional Kerala motifs and open design for welcoming guests. The space includes a small foyer area that transitions into the living spaces.
A comfortable living room featuring local art, wooden furniture, and large windows to promote natural light, following Vastu principles for energy flow.
An open dining area adjacent to the kitchen, designed with a Kerala-style layout and traditional wooden finishes. Natural ventilation is ensured by large windows.
A functional kitchen with ample storage and modern appliances integrated into traditional design elements such as wooden countertops and tiled backsplash reflecting Kerala heritage.
A guest bathroom that adheres to local building norms, equipped with essential facilities while incorporating Vastu guidelines for water element placement.
A utility room for storage of cleaning supplies and equipment, designed with ease of access in mind.

openings.description: Traditional wooden door with intricate carvings, allowing easy entry and aligning with Vastu principles.
Large window to promote natural light and ventilation in the living area.

rooms.description: The master bedroom featuring a private balcony, Kerala-style wooden beams, and traditional motifs. The room is designed for privacy and relaxation.
The second bedroom, providing a serene space with access to natural light and traditional decor aligned with local building norms and Vastu principles.
A full bathroom designed for the bedrooms, featuring modern amenities while adhering to Vastu guidelines.
A dedicated private gym area with ample space for exercise equipment, natural lighting through windows and a ventilation system that ensures energy flow as per Vastu principles.

openings.description: A central staircase ensuring easy movement between levels, designed with safety and traditional aesthetics in mind.
Large balcony window to promote natural light and fresh air.
